title: Occurrence Download
abstract: A dataset containing 77322 species occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Junonia Hübner, 1819" ] } The dataset includes 77322 records from 260 constituent datasets: 77 records from Geelong Field Naturalists Club. 3 records from Museu Darder de Banyoles. 16 records from Insect (MNHM-IN). 3 records from Butterflies of the Rupununi. 439 records from Museums Victoria provider for OZCAM. 13 records from CHAS Entomology Collection (Arctos). 7 records from Osaka Prefectural Minoh Park Insects Museum. 645 records from Earth Guardians Weekly Feed. 24 records from K-State Museum of Entomological and Prairie Arthropod Research. 39 records from Lepidopterous specimens of Yamagata Prefectural Museum. 564 records from IZIKO South Africa Museum Collection (1800-2013). 218 records from The Albert J. Cook Arthropod Research Collection. 17 records from University of Delaware Insect Research Collection. 28 records from Illinois Natural History Survey Insect Collection. 1 records from Insectarium de Montréal (IMQC). 6 records from Biodiversity4all Research-Grade Observations. 1 records from Colección de artrópodos del Museo de Historia Natural de la Pontificia Universidad Javeriana. 10 records from Ross A. Layberry Observations. 2 records from Inventario de fauna presente en la jurisdicción de Corantioquia. 12 records from University of Western Ontario Collection. 124 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Museum collection digitized at storage unit level. 11 records from Données de l'association Martinique Entomologie. 11 records from Diversidad y análisis de la distribución geográfica del suborden Rhopalocera (Lepidoptera) en el estado de Oaxaca: Fase III: región de Huatulco. 625 records from Entomological Specimens of Museum of Nature and Human Activities, Hyogo Pref., Japan. 146 records from Queensland Museum provider for OZCAM. 28 records from Recent Invertebrates Specimens. 35 records from Insect specimens of Kashihara City Museum of Insect. 1 records from Gerald Hilchie Collection. 1 records from USGS PWRC - Native Bee Inventory and Monitoring Lab (BIML). 43 records from Essig Museum of Entomology. 27 records from 2016-2018九份二山昆蟲調查. 1302 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL). 7 records from Inventario de la biodiversidad de vertebrados terrestres de los Chimalapas, Oaxaca. 1 records from Data from ILAM surveys conducted by ARCOS in Mukura landscape for year 2016. 45 records from William F.
